item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hour series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: Cafe Noir across from Olives and next to Mills Tavern on N. Main St.

Cafe Noir is a French inspired restaurant with a distinctively cozy and comfortable European feel. The bar is large, and the creative drinks and food are tasty. Its hard to believe we haven't been back in almost over a year! So, whether you've been there before or if you'd like to give it a try, let's check it out!

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a bright green coat!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Cafe Noir!
